p.codeblock: abstract enableEncryption(enabled: boolean, config: EncryptionConfig): number;
abstract enableEncryption(enabled: boolean, config: EncryptionConfig): number;
Future<void> enableEncryption( {required bool enabled, required EncryptionConfig config});
public abstract int EnableEncryption(bool enabled, EncryptionConfig config);

section.p: The SDK automatically disables encryption after the user leaves the channel. To re-enable encryption, you must call this method before the user joins the channel again.
After the user leaves the channel, the SDK automatically disables encryption. To re-enable encryption, you need to call this method before the user joins the channel again.
After the user leaves the channel, the SDK automatically disables encryption. To enable encryption again, you need to call this method before the user rejoins the channel.
After a user leaves the channel, the SDK automatically disables encryption. To re-enable encryption, you need to call this method before the user rejoins the channel.

ul.li: All users in the same channel must use the same encryption mode and key when calling this method.
If built-in encryption is enabled, the RTMP streaming feature cannot be used.
All users in the same channel must use the same encryption mode and key when calling this method.
If built-in encryption is enabled, you cannot use the CDN streaming feature.
All users in the same channel must set the same encryption mode and key when calling this method.
If built-in encryption is enabled, the CDN live streaming feature cannot be used.
All users in the same channel must use the same encryption mode and key when calling this method.
When built-in encryption is enabled, the RTMP streaming feature cannot be used.

section.title: Timing
section.p: This method must be called before joining a channel.
This method must be called before joining a channel.
This method must be called before joining the channel.
This method must be called before joining the channel.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li:
< 0: Failure
-2: Invalid parameters. You need to reset the parameters.
-4: Incorrect encryption mode or failed to load external encryption library. Check the enum value or reload the external encryption library.
-7: SDK not initialized. You must create the object and complete initialization before calling the API.

< 0: Failure
-2: Invalid parameter. You need to re-specify the parameter.
-4: Incorrect encryption mode or failed to load external encryption library. Check if the enum value is correct or reload the external encryption library.
-7: SDK not initialized. You must create the object and complete initialization before calling the API.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure
-2: Invalid parameter. You need to specify the parameter again.
-4: Incorrect encryption mode or failed to load external encryption library. Check the enum value or reload the external encryption library.
-7: SDK is not initialized. You need to create the object and complete initialization before calling the API.
